stance_1: Family meals usually include a meat entree
stance_2: Housemates prefer meals with meat

justification: Housemates' belief that meals are incomplete without meat directly supports the inclusion of meat in family meals.

justification: Directly stated that after trying fake meat options, the interviewee finds they do not fully replace real meat.

stance_1: Fake meat options do not fully replace real meat

stance_1: Fake meat options do not fully replace real meat
